statements: UPDATE FoodSupplyChain SET production_practices='Organic' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE FoodSupplyChain SET transportation='Refrigerated', origin='Local' WHERE product_name='Apples';
UPDATE FoodSupplyChain SET product_name = 'Organic Apples', origin = 'USA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FoodSupplyChain SET transportation = 'Refrigerated Truck', production_practices = 'Organic farming' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE origin SET region = 'North', city = 'New York' WHERE country = 'USA'
UPDATE production_practices SET certification = 'Organic', description = 'Sustainable farming practices' WHERE method = 'Organic'],

certification = 'Fair Trade' WHERE method = 'Fair Trade' AND description = 'Ethical production standards' WHERE method = 'Ethical' AND certification = 'Certified' WHERE method = 'Certified' AND description = 'High quality standards' WHERE method = 'High Quality'
UPDATE origin SET city = 'New York', region = 'East Coast' WHERE country = 'USA' AND id = 'c2f8129c-90f1-4c9c-859d-4aceb7b234bc';
UPDATE production_practices SET description = 'Sustainable farming practices for eco-friendly production' WHERE method = 'Organic' AND certification = 'USDA Organic';
UPDATE origin_info SET location = 'New York', origin_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE origin_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_info SET distance_km = 150.75, transport_mode = 'Truck' WHERE transport_id = 3;
UPDATE origin_info SET location = 'New York', origin_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE origin_id = 1;
UPDATE transportation_info SET distance_km = 250.75, transport_mode = 'Truck' WHERE transport_id = 3;
UPDATE origin_info SET address='123 Main Street' WHERE origin_id=1;
UPDATE product_info SET category='Electronics', weight=5.75 WHERE product_id=1;
UPDATE origin_info SET address='123 Main St', contact_person='John Doe' WHERE origin_id=1;
UPDATE product_info SET category='Electronics', weight=5.75 WHERE product_id=10;
UPDATE origin SET producer_name = 'Farming Co.' WHERE origin_id = 1;
UPDATE food_products SET product_name = 'Organic Apples' WHERE product_id = 2;

UPDATE food_products SET product_name='Organic Apples', origin_id=3, practice_id=2 WHERE product_id=5;
